Attributes.description: Urban centres can be designed and managed to contribute to biodiversity conservation commitments. Topics include designing human-dominated landscapes to promote biodiversity, the tools required, assessing outcomes, and the benefits and negatives of nature in the city.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of FRST 200, BIOL 230. (or permission of the instructor.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Hugh, Room: Dempster
